products.title: Splash Sloe Purple Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Splash sloe is an extremely attractive dusty purple colour, stylish and timeless. Perfect for injecting colour into any room. Electric roller blinds are perfect for more hard to reach windows and as they are completely cord free they are inherently child safe. This will also add a very modern feel when window dressing, particularly when paired with their smart hub (sold seperately). Splash sloe fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms.

products.title: Vitra Blackout Deep Plum Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their vitra blackout deep plum fabric is a chic very dark blue/ purple shade, it's sleek and stylish and will work beautifully within the home or office. Pair with different purple shades or cool grey tones to create a striking look within your home. Blackout fabrics will completely block light from coming through making them a perfect addition for bedrooms and any room that requires maximum light control.

products.title: Splash Orchid Purple Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash orchid purple electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The pink/purple hue is a beautiful, bold shade which draws the eye and livens up the decor. Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space. At swift direct blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of their free 5 year guarantee, which mean you know you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Bella Blackout Sloe Purple Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home. This soft sloe purple electric roller blind is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style both inside and outside your home.
